column4: ﻿why if i thick the ¨only allow local connections¨ in ¨Remote Desktop Preferences¨ I get this message ¨connection to host ´xxx.local:5900´ was closed¨ if both pcs are in the same LAN???
Local in that context means only connections from the same computer.
You can still connect from a remote computer though, if you set up an ssh-tunnel.
It's not an odd choice, it's just the wording that should be more specific. ;)
